mapper.insert:
SELECT DOCNO_SEQ.NEXTVAL as docno FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO SGN_DOC(DOCNO, DOCTITLE, USERNO, DOCCONTENTS, DOCSTATUS, DOCSTEP, DTNO, DEPTNM, DOCSIGNPATH, CHGDATE, REGDATE, DELETEFLAG) VALUES (#{docno}, #{doctitle}, #{userno}, #{doccontents}, #{docstatus}, 1, #{dtno}, #{deptnm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docsignpath}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 'N')

SELECT SSNO_SIGN_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO SGN_SIGN(SSNO, DOCNO, SSSTEP, SSTYPE, SSRESULT, RECEIVEDATE, SIGNDATE, USERNO, USERPOS) VALUES ( #{ssno}, #{docno}, #{ssstep}, #{sstype}, #{ssresult} , SYSDATE, ${signdate}, #{userno}, #{userpos} )
mapper.select: SELECT DOCNO, DOCTITLE, SD.USERNO, USERNM, DOCCONTENTS, DOCSTATUS, DOCSTEP, DTNO, DEPTNM , TO_CHAR(CHGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as CHGDATE, DOCSIGNPATH FROM SGN_DOC SD INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON SD.USERNO=CU.USERNO WHERE SD.DELETEFLAG='N' AND DOCNO=#{docno}
SELECT SS.USERNO FROM SGN_DOC SD INNER JOIN SGN_SIGN SS ON SS.DOCNO=SD.DOCNO AND SS.SSSTEP=SD.DOCSTEP WHERE SD.DOCNO=#{docno} AND SD.DOCSTATUS IN (1,2)
SELECT SSNO, DOCNO, SSSTEP, SSTYPE, SSRESULT, SD.USERNO, USERNM, SD.USERPOS, SIGNDATE, SSCOMMENT FROM SGN_SIGN SD INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON SD.USERNO=CU.USERNO WHERE DOCNO=#{docno} ORDER BY SSSTEP

SELECT SSNO, DOCNO, SSSTEP, SSTYPE, 0 as SSRESULT, SD.USERNO, USERNM, CD.CODENM as USERPOS FROM SGN_SIGN SD INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON SD.USERNO=CU.USERNO INNER JOIN COM_CODE CD ON CLASSNO='3' AND CD.CODECD=CU.USERPOS WHERE DOCNO = ( SELECT DOCNO FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY DOCNO DESC) AS RNUM, DOCNO FROM SGN_DOC WHERE USERNO=#{userno} AND DTNO=#{dtno} ) WHERE RNUM <= 1 ) ORDER BY SSSTEP
mapper.update: MERGE /*+ USE_HASH AB */ INTO SGN_SIGN SS USING ( SELECT DOCNO, DOCSTEP FROM SGN_DOC SD) SD ON ( SD.DOCNO=SS.DOCNO AND SD.DOCSTEP=SS.SSSTEP ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET SSRESULT=#{ssresult} , SIGNDATE=SYSDATE , SSCOMMENT=#{sscomment}
mapper.select: SELECT SSSTEP FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, SSSTEP FROM SGN_SIGN WHERE DOCNO=#{docno} AND SSRESULT=0 ) WHERE RNUM <= 1
